name: Kyber Kraft
description:
Cyber roguelite RPG with immersive crafting and progression.
Fight neon bots in fast and exciting combat using 2D physics engine.
Equip your hero with various nodes to grant unique attacks and abilities.
Explore the Kyber depths and you may find powerful bosses and rewards.
Listen to immersive synthwave music and enjoy epic visual effects.

Select one of 6 amazing Kyber heroes that best suit your playstyle.
Each hero has a class ability that enables unique gameplay.
Discover various combinations between hero and node abilities.

Upgrade your nodes to add bonuses to power, speed, range and count.
To upgrade a node simply drag-and-drop it onto another node.

Upgrade will combine both nodes into one and add an attribute point.
- Power increases node damage and size.
- Speed increases node fire-rate and recharge.
- Range increases the maximum range of attacks.
- Count increases the number of parts in the node.

Equip your hero with various powerful items to help you in battle.
Each Item has Tier and Quality:
- higher quality increases the base values of each item.
- higher tiers increases the value multiplier.
New items and item upgrades can be gained from victory rewards.

Color codes are the synergy mechanic that depend on node colors.
Each node you equip adds code bonus depending on tier.
These color codes will apply various status effects to bots.

Explore the network to find more powerful rewards.
Access each server and fight the bots within.
There are multiple mechanics, colors and bot types.
